title: Payne and Orth SGC 40 - Orth Reduced
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Payne and Orth SGC 40 - Orth Reduced
posts.post_content:
The "Curveless Wonder" Al Orth, a Southern Leagues card, is up for grabs.  He won 204 major league games though without a curve and without a fast ball.  His pitch was described as a "glistening ball... but little speed, and scarce a curve at all." ;)

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/23473/orth-sl[/IMG]

and Fred Payne as well, never a star, never a regular, with one career home run to his credit.  Look at the size of that left thumb, reputed to be the largest thumb in the T206 set.  Fred is buried in Mexico.  I have no information about where the thumb is buried.:eek:

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10288/payne[/IMG]

Let's start with Orth at $69 and Payne at $38.  Shipping included or take them both for $107.  A small surcharge for regular Paypal.  Any no fee payment method accepted.
What would it take to get these cards into your collection? --- A Gold Border perhaps.;)

An SGC 40 Southern Leaguer for less than $70 is

A.  Sheer fantasy

B.  Sheer lunacy

C.  Sheer hosiery

D.  All of the above

Adding Fred Payne to your order would

A.  Augment your thumb collection

B.  Augment my PP account

C.  Augment your Monster Number and Frank Bucks

D.  All of the above
